column5: Headed out to my local pike hole tonight with a couple of friends.  Tried a few different areas floating shiners and eventually I hooked into this little guy.    The bite was a bit slow and the sun was dropping fast.  We decided to call it a night and head off.  Nice being out tonight as she was a beauty.    Will be heading out Sunday morning to try again with my father.  Hope we get into some.  Corn Nug
Nice!   And a guy taking a leak in the backround to boot!  Beauty!!!
nice pics!  yeah that guy at the back was the first thing i noticed lol.
I see a common thread about the first thing noticed as that is what I saw first.  Nice pic and beautiful sunset.  Kinda like a car wreck, your eyes are just drawn to it.
lol thats to funny nice pic our eyes are like magnets thats the first thing I saw also. Great pics by the way the dude draining the main vain is just a bonus lol.

LOL...same here...saw the guy taking a piss and then said...Oh yeah...there's a fish in there too...  I noticed that same sky where I was fishing last night too....it was a great sight that's for sure.  Great job on the pike!!
I love it.  To me thats a perfect fishing photo, about as candid as they come.  Thanks for a good morning chuckle.
Way to go Andy.  Nice catch..  Sherriff
I just glad it was a pic of what you were holding and not what your buddy was.  Nice Pike Corn Nug!
love the backdrop of that classy shot! hahaha
